ingredients.ingredient: 1 (9 ounce) package spinach and cheese tortellini (such as Three Bridges® Tortellini)
1 (4 ounce) jar pesto (such as Three Bridges® Pesto)
¼ cup halved, seeded, and sliced English cucumber
¼ cup matchstick-sized pieces red onion
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Layer ingredients in the jar with pesto on the bottom to prevent wilting of delicate greens
Keep jar sealed and refrigerated; shake well before eating to distribute dressing
Prepare the day before for best flavor development and convenient meal prep
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How should you layer the ingredients in the jar to maintain freshness and prevent the greens from becoming soggy during storage?
